Over the last year, the world has seen what we always knew...
...that no people on earth are so fearless, or daring, or determined as Americans.
If there is a mountain, we climb it.
If there is a frontier, we cross it.
If there's a challenge, we tame it.
If there is an opportunity, we seize it.
...and they deserve a government that shows them the same love and loyalty in return.
We all share the same home, the same heart, the same destiny...
